name: The Real Zombie Apocalypse
description:
You are in a village where all of the citizens have been turned into zombies. You have been selected to go to this village and kill all of the the zombies so they don't spread and infect more people

Controls:
WASD...........................Move
Shift + WASD............Sprint
Space............................Jump
Right-click (hold)......Aim
Left-click (click).........Shoot
R......................................Reload
1......................................Unarmed
2......................................Equip Pistol
3......................................Equip Assault Rifle
4......................................Equip Shotgun
Esc..................................Pause Game
Mouse..........................Move Camera
